enchantment.everything_morph.morph.desc: Grants the ability to morph into a custom entity when used.
enchantment.everything_morph.fly_sword.d: Summons a flying sword that you can ride when used.
config.everything_morph.enable_skin_cach: Enable skin caching for better performance
Maximum skin cache size in MB (0 means unlimited)
config.everything_morph.skin_retry_count: Number of retries for skin loading
config.everything_morph.skin_retry_delay: Skin loading retry delay in milliseconds
